com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base

Class MemBuffersBase<S extends Segment<S>,CB extends ChunkyMemBuffer,SB extends StreamyMemBuffer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.MemBuffersBase<S,CB,SB>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemBuffersForBytes, MemBuffersForLongs

    public abstract class MemBuffersBase<S extends Segment<S>,CB extends ChunkyMemBuffer,SB extends StreamyMemBuffer>
extends Object
    Container for a set of MemBuffers. Used for constructing MemBuffer instances that all share a single SegmentAllocator instance, and global memory allocation limits (enforced by allocator).

    Note that sub-classing is explicitly supported; this is needed to use custom SegmentAllocators, Segments and/or MemBuffers. Default MemBuffersBase implementation will use default implementations of other components.

    Also note that while this object is the factory for MemBuffer instances, it does not keep references to instances created. Because of this, it is important that buffers are closed (either explicitly, or by using appropriate wrappers to do that).

    Author:
    Tatu Saloranta
